VerifiableConsumer.exec_cmd: source /tmp/venv/bin/activate && sudo mkdir -p /mnt/verifiable_consumer && sudo chmod 777 /mnt/verifiable_consumer && sudo mkdir -p /mnt/verifiable_consumer/logs && sudo chmod 777 /mnt/verifiable_consumer/logs && sudo touch /mnt/verifiable_consumer/verifiable_consumer.stderr && sudo chmod 777 /mnt/verifiable_consumer/verifiable_consumer.stderr && sudo python -m confluent_kafka.kafkatest.verifiable_consumer

VerifiableProducer.exec_cmd: source /tmp/venv/bin/activate && sudo mkdir -p /mnt/verifiable_producer && sudo chmod 777 /mnt/verifiable_producer && sudo mkdir -p /mnt/verifiable_producer/logs && sudo chmod 777 /mnt/verifiable_producer/logs && sudo touch /mnt/verifiable_producer/verifiable_producer.stderr && sudo chmod 777 /mnt/verifiable_producer/verifiable_producer.stderr && sudo python -m confluent_kafka.kafkatest.verifiable_producer
